mapper.select: select DISTINCT bi.bookseq from tblBookprgByUser bu inner join tblIndex bi on bu.indexSeq = bi.indexSeq where bu.id=#{id}

select bookSeq, bookName, publisher, price, pbDate, author, bookLike, lv, bookImg, crtName, FLOOR(100*b/a) as per from ( select a.bookSeq as bookSeq, a.bookName as bookName, a.publisher as publisher, a.price as price, a.pbDate as pbDate, a.author as author, a.bookLike as bookLike, a.lv as lv, a.bookImg as bookImg, c.crtName as crtName, (select count(*) from tblBookprgByUser where indexSeq in (select indexSeq from tblindex where bookseq=#{seq}) and id=#{id}) as a, (select count(*) from tblBookprgByUser where indexSeq in (select indexSeq from tblindex where bookseq=#{seq}) and id=#{id} and learnCheck = 1) as b from tblbook a inner join tblCrtByBook cb on a.bookSeq = cb.bookSeq left join tblCrt c on cb.crtSeq=c.crtSeq where a.bookSeq=#{seq})
select * from tblIndex i left join (select * from tblBookprgByUser where id = #{id}) bp on i.indexSeq = bp.indexSeq where bookSeq = #{seq} ORDER BY listNum asc
mapper.update: update tblBookprgByUser set learnCheck = #{learn} where bookprcByUserSeq = #{seq} and id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from tblStudy s inner join tblCrt c on s.crtSeq = c.crtSeq where studySeq=#{s}
mapper.insert: insert into tblChat (chatSeq, code, sender, receiver, content, regdate) values (chatSeq.nextVal, #{code}, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{content}, #{regdate})
insert into tblToDoList (toDoListSeq, studySeq, toDo, completeDate, id, toDoComment, writeDate) values (toDoListSeq.nextVal, #{studySeq}, #{toDo}, #{completeDate}, #{id}, #{toDoComment}, sysdate)
